meanings.sent1: The bygone days of childhood were filled with laughter and play.
meanings.sent2: The old house stood as a reminder of bygone years.
meanings.sent3: In the attic, we found a bygone toy that made us all smile.
meanings.sent4: Her bygone hairstyle was like a vintage painting come to life.
meanings.sent5: The bygone era of black-and-white movies had a charm all its own.

meanings.sent1: The bygone owner of the shop was known for his kindness.
meanings.sent2: She missed her bygone friends who had moved away.
meanings.sent3: The bygone recipe for apple pie was a family secret.
meanings.sent4: His bygone career in music still brought a smile to his face.
meanings.sent5: The bygone days of summer felt like a dream now.

meanings.definition: Something that is in the past
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed artifacts from the bygone.
meanings.sent2: She cherished the memories of her bygone.
meanings.sent3: The bygone of ancient civilizations fascinated the students.
meanings.sent4: His collection of bygones included old coins and stamps.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the bygone was like stepping into a time machine.
